Title: DIETRICH OT-1 ORGANIC TIME 1 CRYSTAL SAPHIRE AUTOMATIC WATCH
Description: Free Overnight UPS shipping to anywhere in the Continental United States! &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;img src="http://ti2.auctiva.com/web/aswCredit.gif" border="0"&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href="http://www.auctiva.com/?how=scLnk1" target="_blank"&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;img src="http://ti2.auctiva.com/images/sc1line1.gif" border="0"&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt; This watch is brand new, comes with box and papers and sold from an Authorized Retailer.Organic Time 1 - Case, frame and bezel 316L steel, case frame and bezel micro-beads blasted/polished and coated with black PVD. - Modified automatic mechanical movement Miyota 82-S-7 with open view on the escapement dial side. - 4 layered dial: first and third layers sun brushed black, second and fourth layers vertical brushed black. - Hour and minute, small second and 24 Hours hand. - Water resistant up to 50 meters/5 ATM. - Bright green night luminescent "Luminova" on hands and indexes underneath the sapphire glass and for the 24 hours indicator. - Sapphire glass with anti-glare coating on the underneath side. - Crown sealed with double O-ring. - Screwed and engraved back. - Dimensions: Length 48 mm/1,89 Inches - Width of the case 46 mm/1,81 Inches - Total width including the crown 49 mm/1,92 Inches - Height 13,7mm/0,51 Inches. - Weight with bracelet: around 128 Grams. - Comes with a double layered, reinforced, Nylon strap. - Two-year warranty Track Page Views WithAuctiva's FREE Counter

ReturnPolicy.Description: Items must be returned in the same condition as it was shipped. For pens- un-inked, dipped and unused and in full packing. If a watch, unworn, strap not pierced and in full packaging. Shipping costs are no refundable.
